about_the_game:
Nightfall Wardens

Nightfall is more than a game—it’s a survival show. In a world haunted by overpopulation and a century-old demon, every person reaching the “right age” is thrust into a brutal televised competition. Only the cleverest, strongest, and most ruthless players will survive the rounds and earn their way out alive.

Key Features:

  • 6-Player PvP/PvE Survival: Face off against up to 5 other players and entities in 3 rounds, balancing your survival instincts with strategic choices. Compete to stay alive as you dodge entities and other players.

  • Deck-Building Strategy: Build and customize a deck of abilities each round, using survival and sabotage cards to counter entities threats and outsmart opponents. Adapt your strategy to your environment.

  • High-Stakes Showdown: In the final round, it’s every player for themselves in a last-man-standing fight. Every knockout brings you closer to victory, with points awarded for each survival feat.

  • The Ultimate Sacrifice: Compete live for survival and glory, sacrificing to the demon that has terrorized humanity for over a century. The highest-scoring survivor wins their freedom, while the others join the world’s dark history as sacrifices.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, players will encounter graphic depictions of violence, including scenes with decapitated corpses and dismembered limbs. These elements are integral to the game's atmosphere and narrative. Viewer discretion is advised.
